A collaboration technique performed by two [[Hyūga clan]] members. One performs the [[Protecting Eight Trigrams Sixty-Four Palms]] technique and the other uses the [[Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven]] around it. This creates a huge sphere with both offensive and defensive power, causing great damage to the opponent.

== Trivia ==
* In ''[[Rock Lee's Springtime of Youth Full Power Ninja Chronicles]]'', Hinata and Neji used this technique to defeat some [[Kusagakure]]-nin.
